articles.author: Donald Judd and Paul LeBlanc, CNN
articles.title: Biden to mark Transgender Day of Visibility with new measures in support of transgender Americans - CNN
articles.description: The Biden administration is marking the International Transgender Day of Visibility on Thursday with a series of measures in support of transgender Americans as they face efforts to curb their rights across the country.

articles.title: Record-Setting NASA Astronaut and Two Cosmonauts Return From International Space Station - SciTechDaily
articles.description: After extending the record for the longest single spaceflight in history by an American to 355 days, NASA astronaut Mark Vande Hei returned to Earth on Wednesday, March 30, 2022, along with Roscosmos cosmonauts Anton Shkaplerov and Pyotr Dubrov. The trio depa…
articles.content: NASA astronaut Mark Vande Hei is seen outside the Soyuz MS-19 spacecraft after he landed with Russian cosmonauts Anton Shkaplerov and Pyotr Dubrov in a remote area near the town of Zhezkazgan, Kazakh… [+3705 chars]

articles.title: Jeff Koons to send sculptures to moon as part of NFT launch | Daily Sabah - Daily Sabah
articles.description: American pop artist Jeff Koons will exhibit his sculptures on a more exotic space now: The moon. The artist aims to send his work to the moon where it will...
articles.content:
American pop artist Jeff Koons will exhibit his sculptures on a more exotic space now: The moon. The artist aims to send his work to the moon where it will be sold as non-fungible tokens (NFTs).

articles.author: Matthew Cranston
articles.title: US agrees to fund Australian critical minerals projects - The Australian Financial Review
articles.description: America has committed to help finance Australian critical minerals projects through its export financing arms.
